title: ‘You will see the wrath’ — Progressives warn Biden against cutting down agenda
description: Biden won the White House on the back of parents. Now, with Joe Manchin proving unmovable, he may lose their support.
content: The situation has alarmed liberal advocates and unnerved Democrats who believe winning the support of parents is key to keeping control of power in Washington. Caregivers already exhausted by the pan… [+7892 chars]
